setting.name: FEXTOSC
setting.description: External Oscillator mode selection bits

option.description: EC above 8MHz; PFM set to high power
option.name: ECH

option.description: EC for 500kHz to 8MHz; PFM set to medium power
option.name: ECM

option.description: EC below 500kHz; PFM set to low power
option.name: ECL

option.description: HS (crystal oscillator) above 4MHz; PFM set to high power
option.name: HS

option.description: XT (crystal oscillator) above 500kHz, below 4MHz; PFM set to medium power
option.name: XT

option.description: LP (crystal oscillator) optimized for 32.768kHz; PFM set to low power
option.name: LP

setting.name: RSTOSC
setting.description: Power-up default value for COSC bits

option.description: EXTOSC with 4x PLL, with EXTOSC operating per FEXTOSC bits
option.name: EXT4X

option.description: HFINTOSC with 2x PLL, with OSCFRQ = 16 MHz and CDIV = 1:1 (FOSC = 32 MHz)
option.name: HFINTPLL

option.description: HFINTOSC with OSCFRQ= 32 MHz and CDIV = 1:1
option.name: HFINT32

setting.name: CLKOUTEN
setting.description: Clock Out Enable bit

option.description: CLKOUT function is enabled; FOSC/4 clock appears at OSC2
option.name: ON

option.description: CLKOUT function is disabled; i/o or oscillator function on OSC2
option.name: OFF

setting.name: CSWEN
setting.description: Clock Switch Enable bit

option.description: Writing to NOSC and NDIV is allowed
option.name: ON

option.description: The NOSC and NDIV bits cannot be changed by user software
option.name: OFF

setting.name: FCMEN
setting.description: Fail-Safe Clock Monitor Enable bit

setting.name: MCLRE
setting.description: Master Clear Enable bit

option.description: MCLR pin is Master Clear function
option.name: ON

option.description: MCLR pin function is port defined function
option.name: OFF

setting.name: PWRTE
setting.description: Power-up Timer Enable bit

setting.name: LPBOREN
setting.description: Low-Power BOR enable bit

setting.name: BOREN
setting.description: Brown-out reset enable bits

option.description: Brown-out Reset Enabled, SBOREN bit is ignored
option.name: ON

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled while running, disabled in sleep; SBOREN is ignored
option.name: NSLEEP

option.description: Brown-out reset enabled according to SBOREN bit
option.name: SBOREN

setting.name: BORV
setting.description: Brown-out Reset Voltage Selection

option.description: Brown-out Reset Voltage (VBOR) set to 1.9V on LF, and 2.45V on F Devices
option.name: LO

option.description: Brown-out Reset Voltage (VBOR) is set to 2.7V
option.name: HI

setting.name: ZCD
setting.description: Zero-cross detect disable

option.description: Zero-cross detect circuit is disabled at POR.
option.name: OFF

option.description: Zero-cross detect circuit is always enabled
option.name: ON

setting.name: PPS1WAY
setting.description: Peripheral Pin Select one-way control

option.description: The PPSLOCK bit can be cleared and set only once in software
option.name: ON

option.description: The PPSLOCK bit can be set and cleared repeatedly by software
option.name: OFF

setting.name: STVREN
setting.description: Stack Overflow/Underflow Reset Enable bit

option.description: Stack Overflow or Underflow will cause a reset
option.name: ON

option.description: Stack Overflow or Underflow will not cause a reset
option.name: OFF

setting.name: WDTCPS
setting.description: WDT Period Select bits

option.description: Divider ratio 1:65536; software control of WDTPS
option.name: WDTCPS_31

setting.name: WDTE
setting.description: WDT operating mode

option.description: WDT enabled/disabled by SWDTEN bit in WDTCON0
option.name: SWDTEN

option.description: WDT enabled while sleep=0, suspended when sleep=1; SWDTEN ignored
option.name: NSLEEP

option.description: WDT enabled regardless of sleep; SWDTEN ignored
option.name: ON

setting.name: WDTCWS
setting.description: WDT Window Select bits

option.description: window delay = 87.5 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_0

option.description: window delay = 75 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_1

option.description: window delay = 62.5 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_2

option.description: window delay = 50 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_3

option.description: window delay = 37.5 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_4

option.description: window delay = 25 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_5

option.description: window always open (100%); no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_6

option.description: window always open (100%); software control; keyed access not required
option.name: WDTCWS_7

setting.name: WDTCCS
setting.description: WDT input clock selector

option.description: WDT reference clock is the 31.0kHz LFINTOSC output
option.name: LFINTOSC

option.description: WDT reference clock is the 31.25 kHz HFINTOSC
option.name: HFINTOSC

setting.name: BBSIZE
setting.description: Boot Block Size Selection bits

setting.name: BBEN
setting.description: Boot Block Enable bit

setting.name: SAFEN
setting.description: SAF Enable bit

setting.name: WRTAPP
setting.description: Application Block Write Protection bit

setting.name: WRTB
setting.description: Boot Block Write Protection bit

setting.name: WRTC
setting.description: Configuration Register Write Protection bit

setting.name: WRTSAF
setting.description: Storage Area Flash Write Protection bit

setting.name: LVP
setting.description: Low Voltage Programming Enable bit

option.description: Low Voltage programming enabled. MCLR/Vpp pin function is MCLR.
option.name: ON

option.description: High Voltage on MCLR/Vpp must be used for programming
option.name: OFF

setting.name: CP
setting.description: UserNVM Program memory code protection bit

setting.default: WDT window violation reset has not occurred
setting.name: nWDTWV

option.name: WDT window violation reset has occurred
option.alias: WDT window violation reset has occurred

option.name: WDT window violation reset has not occurred
option.alias: WDT window violation reset has not occurred

option.alias: 1-input D flip-flop with S and R

option.name: 1-input transparent latch with S and R
option.alias: 1-input transparent latch with S and R

setting.name: BF
setting.description: Buffer Full Status bit

setting.name: UA
setting.description: Update Address bit

setting.name: R_nW
setting.description: Read/Write Information bit

setting.name: S
setting.description: Start bit

setting.name: P
setting.description: Stop bit

setting.name: D_nA
setting.description: Data/Address bit

setting.name: CKE
setting.description: SPI Clock Edge Select bit

setting.name: SMP
setting.description: SPI Data Input Sample Phase bit

setting.name: SSPM
setting.description: Synchronous Serial Port Mode Select bits

setting.name: CKP
setting.description: SPI Clock Polarity Select bit/I2C Clock stretch

setting.name: SSPEN
setting.description: Synchronous Serial Port Enable bit

setting.name: SSPOV
setting.description: Receive Overflow Indicator bit

setting.name: WCOL
setting.description: Write Collision Detect bit

setting.name: SEN
setting.description: Start Condition Enable/Stretch Enable bit

setting.name: RSEN
setting.description: : Repeated Start Condition Enable bit (Master mode only)

setting.name: PEN
setting.description: Stop Condition Enable bit (Master mode only)

setting.name: RCEN
setting.description: Receive Enable bit (Master mode only)

setting.name: ACKEN
setting.description: Acknowledge Sequence Enable bit (Master Receive mode only)

setting.name: ACKDT
setting.description: Acknowledge Data bit (Receive mode only)

setting.name: ACKSTAT
setting.description: Acknowledge Status bit (Transmission only)

setting.name: GCEN
setting.description: General Call Enable bit (Slave mode only)

setting.name: DHEN
setting.description: Data Hold Enable bit

setting.name: AHEN
setting.description: Address Hold Enable bit (I2C Slave mode only)

setting.name: SBCDE
setting.description: Slave mode Bus Collision Detect Enable bit (I2C Slave mode only)

setting.name: SDAHT
setting.description: SDA Hold Time selection bit (I2C mode only)

setting.name: BOEN
setting.description: Buffer Overwrite Enable bit

setting.name: SCIE
setting.description: Start Condition Interrupt Enable

setting.name: PCIE
setting.description: Stop Condition Interrupt Enable

setting.name: ACKTIM
setting.description: Acknowledge Time Status bit (I2C Slave mode only)

setting.name: SSPADD
setting.description: Address or Divider bits

option.name: Starts at rising edge on TMR2_ers
option.alias: Starts at rising edge on TMR2_ers

option.name: Starts at falling edge on TMR2_ers
option.alias: Starts at falling edge on TMR2_ers

option.alias: Starts at rising edge and resets on TMR2_ers=0

option.name: Starts at falling edge and resets on TMR2_ers=1
option.alias: Starts at falling edge and resets on TMR2_ers=1

option.alias: Starts on rising edge on TMR2_ers

option.name: Starts on falling edge on TMR2_ers

option.alias: Starts on rising/falling edge on TMR2_ers
